controlled_vocabulary.comment: This table provides the restricted vocabulary for the column type in the table software and is used to restrict the search of software to those performing a particular function
The elements of this controlled vocabulary are encoded in the curation tool. They regulate the sub-setting of which software entries are displayed in the software screen.

term.name: image_analysis
term.description: software used to extract intensity data from a scanned image

term.name: scanner
term.description: software used to scan in an image

term.name: spotter
term.description: software used to drive an array spotter
